member.name: M:AirportBoard.BasicRender.Draw(System.String)
member.summary:
Draw allows you to use a string of characters to "Draw" on screen.
0 = Black 8 = Gray
1 = Blue 9 = Light Blue
2 = Green A = Light Green
3 = Aqua B = Light Aqua
4 = Red C = Light Red
5 = Purple D = Light Purple
6 = Yellow E = Light Yellow
7 = White F = Bright White

member.name: M:AirportBoard.BasicRender.Echo(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a message
member.param: The message you wish to display, dumb dumb
Wether or not to put a linebreak

member.summary: Write text to a window
member.param: The text to be put on the window
Leftpos in reference to the window
Toppos in reference to the window
